item.title: Monolith by Monoprice THX Certified Satellite Speaker Review
item.description:
Foreword / YouTube Video Review

I was loaned these from a viewer for review. These speakers come sold in pairs or as part of at 5.1 kit. If, after evaluating the data, you are interested in purchasing these speakers please consider using my affiliate links below:
